Truth or Dare Which do you pick. I had just about no good expectations for this movie From the trailers it looked like another Unfriended or a Getaway where most of the movie was going to filmed on webcams and iPhones. But surprisingly enough I really enjoyed this fl ic k. The neon lights in the city made the movie visually pleasing to watch Dave Franco and Emma Roberts are not too hard to look at either They had good chemistry with one another and their relationship that was developed throughout this game was fun to watch. Some of the stunt work in this movie just blew me away also Check out the scene involving train tracks That is mind blow ing The crazy insane dares keep escalating as the film progresses To see Franco and Roberts have to meet those demands kept me on the edge of my seat. But this being a teen movie there is under age drinking don t recommend it that leads to unnecessary cheesy drama between the lead characters What makes it so bad is that they take the drama seriously and it interweaves into the story.. Also I guess it should be said that this is logically flawed So don t expect to see stunt work that wouldn t kill you if you decide to go out there and a ttempt it. You don t need to rush to see this one in theaters considering it s cold ass January But if you do so you ll probably have fun.
